dialogues.speaker: Captain Reynolds
dialogues.text: Alright team, we have a new mission. Get ready.

dialogues.speaker: Crew Member
dialogues.text: Captain, could you enlighten us on the details of the mission?

dialogues.speaker: Captain Reynolds
dialogues.text: We're heading to the outskirts of the Alpha Centauri system. Intel detected a strange energy spike there.

dialogues.speaker: Crew Member
dialogues.text: Any idea of what we are supposed to expect?

dialogues.speaker: Captain Reynolds
dialogues.text: Unknown. That's why we're going in heavy. I want eyes sharp, let's not get caught off guard.

dialogues.speaker: Crew Member
dialogues.text: Understood, Captain. Let's go and check it out.
